bill_title: establish certain provisions regarding inspections of food service and mobile food service establishments.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain provisions regarding inspections of food service and mobile food service establishments. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 34-18 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Every food service establishment and mobile food service establishment licensed in this state shall post a sign or decal stating the availability of inspection results on the Department of Health website on a front entrance or in a conspicuous place. The sign or decal shall include the website address, department contact information, and a QR code to access the information. Section 2. That chapter 34-18 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The department may charge a fee for supplying the signs or decals. Section 3. That chapter 34-18 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The department may promulgate rules regarding the contents of the signs or decals, the location of display for signs or decals, the method of supplying signs or decals, and the amount and method collection for signs or decals. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
